Posts.Content: Hi anne thank you for the reply . I hope you dont mind but I noticed on your introduction you mentioned you have had a few scans how did you cope and did the radiographers let you know anything . Thank ypu again . Xxxx
Posts.Title: very anxious please can anyone help

Posts.Content: Thank you Dorothee so glad I joined this forum needed someone to talk to family just getting cross woth me getting upset all the time . Xxxxxx
Posts.Title: very anxious please can anyone help

Posts.Content: hi everyone i am new on here so bear with me , i am 40yrs old with 2 young daughters , was diagnosed in october 2013 with grade 3 ivbc with 2/15 node involvement , had wle and node clearance in november just one tiny margin left unclear , but , went onto chemo and will have surgery later . so far i have had 3  x ec with very little side effects except my liver function tests are a little high . i am about to start 3 x t with herceptin  when out of the blue i had an appointment to go for an abdo and thorax ct prior to starting next lot of treatment  , spoke to the chemo nurse who said that the oncology team want to see what is going on with my liver , its the alt enzyme which is slightly raised but nothing else , as you can imagine my mind is running riot , cant eat , sleep cant stop crying keep thinking they think its liver mets . sorry for going on a bit . love to all you wonderful ladies . xxxxxx
Posts.Title: very anxious please can anyone help

Posts.Content: thank you for all your very kind and supportive messages , my scan is on wednesday and onc apt on monday  , so so nervous cant concentrate on anything have been so tempted lots of times to cancel the scan but i know my family would go crazy . xxxxxxxxx
